thread.title: Valmont Industries, Inc. Announces Fourth Quarter 2017 Earnings Conference Call

author: cnbc.com
title: Valmont Industries, Inc. Announces Fourth Quarter 2017 Earnings Conference Call
text:
OMAHA, Neb., Feb. 15, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Valmont Industries, Inc. (NYSE: VMI), a leading global provider of engineered products and services for infrastructure and mechanized irrigation equipment for agriculture, will hold its Fourth Quarter 2017 Earnings Conference Call on Thursday, February 22, 2018 beginning at 8:00 a.m. CST.
An audio discussion of Valmont's fourth quarter 2017 results by Stephen G. Kaniewski, President and Chief Executive Officer and Mark C. Jaksich, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, will be available live by telephone by dialing 1-877-493-2981 and entering Conference ID#: 2874769 or via the Internet at 8:00 a.m. CST on February 22, 2018, by pointing browsers to: https://engage.vevent.com/rt/valmontindustries_ao~2874769
The Company's slide presentation for the call will be simultaneously available on the Investors page at www.valmont.com .
After the event, you may listen by accessing the above link or by telephone. Dial 1-855-859-2056, 404-537-3406, or internationally at 1-800-585-8367 and enter the Conference ID#: 2874769 beginning February 22, 2018 at 11:00 a.m. CST through 10:59 p.m. CST on March 1, 2018.
Valmont is a global leader in designing and manufacturing poles, towers and structures for lighting and traffic, wireless communication and utility markets, industrial access systems, road safety products and a provider of protective coating services. Valmont also leads the world in mechanized irrigation equipment for agriculture, enhancing food production while conserving and protecting natural water resources.
View original content: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/valmont-industries-inc-announces-fourth-quarter-2017-earnings-conference-call-300598764.html
SOURCE Valmont Industries, Inc.
